::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
library(leaflet)
library(gganimate)
library(fs)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
path = path("data", "processed")

file_full = path(path, list.files(path))

dat_full = read.csv(file_full)
```
